project.description: The name of the project to add ngx-formwork to.

registrationStyle.description: How components and validators will be registered. Possible values: token, map

provideInline.description: Put provideFormwork call directly in app.config.ts (defaults to false)

providerConfigPath.description: Where the provider file should be placed. Defaults to 'src/app'

providerConfigFileName.description: Name of the provider file. Defaults to 'formwork.config.ts'

includeSyncValidators.description: Whether to include validators (sync) setup via injection tokens or config

includeAsyncValidators.description: Whether to include async validators setup via injection tokens or config

useHelper.description: Whether to include the helper files

helperPath.description: Where helper files should be placed. Defaults to 'src/app/shared/helper'

splitRegistrations.description: Whether to split the registrations into a separate file

registrationsPath.description: Where registration files should be placed. Defaults to 'src/app/registrations'

useSchematicConfig.description: Whether to include an extra file for schematics configuration. If set to false, all configuration for the schematics will be set up in angular.json

schematicsConfigPath.description: Where the schematics config should be placed. Defaults to 'src/app'

schematicConfigFileName.description: Name of the schematic config file. Defaults to 'formwork.config.json'
